coloredTexts.text: You are welcome here, adventurer, let us hope you do not disturb our peace here.
I used to be an adventurer like you. Then I took an arrow in the knee.
Be careful adventurer, there are dangerous creatures out there.
Be careful adventurer, danger is around the corner.
What a nasty Silverfish... Oh wait... It's a cat...
Always be prepared to fight, the world is unpredictable.
Creepers have me paranoid..... What was that noise!?
Why do they have to be zombies and skeletons? They terrify me.
If I were you, I wouldn't mess with the iron golems, Bob hasn't landed yet.
I will protect this village with my life! So be careful what you do traveler.
